text: Kamaghɨn, Godɨn Duamɨn otivaghirir mɨzebav geir gavgavim, God nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Kraisɨn itir puvatɨzibar akakaghasa, anenɨngi. Egha a nɨghnɨzir gavgavim itiba bagha anenɨngizir puvatɨ. Egha Godɨn otivir akabar gun mɨgeir gavgavim, God nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Kraisɨn itibar akakaghasa, anenɨngi. Egha nɨghnɨzir gavgavim puvatɨziba bagha, anenɨngizir puvatɨ.
